snippet: SCHNEIDER--Claire, 92, died on January 5, 2016. She was predeceased by her husband of 54 years, David. She is survived by her daughters Stephanie Singer of Florida, Amy Schneider of New Hampshire and Tina Schneider of Maine. She is also survived by her seven grandchildren, three great-grandchildren, and an extended family who loved her dearly. Funeral services to be held at noon on January 7th at Riverside Memorial Chapel, New York City. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Crohn's and Colitis Foundation of America or the Multiple Sclerosis Foundation. 1/3

In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Crohn's and Colitis Foundation of America or the Multiple Sclerosis Foundation. 1/3
